sections.title: Guidelines for Posting
sections.text:
-	Your story should be an honest recounting of a memory or experience of Dan.
-	Your story should be no shorter than a paragraph.
-	Your name should your real, full name. If you are uncomfortable posting your full name, please include only your first name, or something that identifies how you knew Dan (ex. “Dan’s friend from high school”).
-	Try to minimize grammatical and spelling mistakes. Using a word processor and then copy/pasting might be a clever idea.

sections.title: Submitting a Story
sections.text: When you fill out all the fields and press the submit button, your story will be displayed under the “stories” tab. This update should happen near instantly.

sections.title: Can Anyone Submit a Story?
sections.text: Yes. If you have any story you want to share about Dan, we encourage you to write it here and submit it.

sections.title: Are the Stories Moderated?
sections.text: Yes. The stories are moderated. This mean that any story that does not comply with the guidelines will be removed.

sections.title: How do I edit/remove my story?
sections.text: If you would like to change or delete your story, please email either sevysdayoff@gmail.com or p.lortie@rogers.ca
